column4: i know this sounds dumb but i have a duel boot with windows xp and i was woundering how to get xp to be the defualt start up system

ok

hold on
the line is called 'default' it will be something like this > default 0
0 is the first entry called 'title', so the second entry is called 1, and the third entry 2, etc.
find the entry that has the os you want for default, and change the 0 after default 0 to that number, save the file, and reboot.
*NO*
like I said, where it says, on a line by itself default 0
no, keep looking.
it is on a line by itself.it is the first line at the very top that doesn't have a # before it.

it is the very first line, from the top that DOES NOT HAVE A #
